1.content:
As the storm was getting worst and driving down this two lane road, Randy looked over at Jim and said "this is getting pretty bad and its getting harder and harder to see the road, I think i will pull over at the next chance we get."
"Yea", said Jim, as he look in the back to see Tina a sleep, she was so beautiful laying there a sleep, with her long blonde hair hanging slighty over her face, she had the body most women would die for.

"i cant belive she came with us". Jim told Randy, but before Randy could respone, he yelled, "Look over there a big house, do you think we should pull over?"
1.title: the storm

11.content:
Randy came back with, "I think we are going to pull over and see if anyone is home." Jim nodded his head in agreement. So Randy pulled into the long lane leading to the house, as he pulled up and stop the car.

"where are we" came a voice from the back seat. Tina sat up looking around.

"The weather is too bad to continue." Randy said.

"Well I dont think we should go in." Tina said.

"So what do you want to do?" Jim said

111.content:
"Well I am not staying in the car, so I am going in" Randy said as he opened the car door and ran up on the pourch. Soon Tina and Jim were right beside him.

Randy knocked on the door a few times with no answer, so he tried the door. It was unlocked and with some effort he got the door opened and they went inside.

"It looks like no one has live here in years." Tina said.

Jim replied, "Yea, we should look around for some lights and maybe something to keep us warm".

Randy looked over and saw some stair going up and some going down. "well lets split up and go see, Tina you stay on the main floor, Jim, you go upstairs and I'll go downstairs."

1111111.content:
As Tina woke up she was greeted with handcuffs on her wrists and a gag in her mouth. As she turned her head as far as possible she saw bloody tables, just then she heard a voice, she quickly turned her head up to see a man with a surgical mask covering his face. Tina screamed as loudly as she could but the gag prevented her from screaming loudly. As she realized it was no hope then the chilling voice of her captor spoke "welcome, you have been selected to try out in one of my experiments, and as you like snooping around why don't I tell you more of this experiment of mine". "As you may know I've been preforming some illegal experiments and they didn't end as I planed". "Now lets get you ready for the experiment, ah I forgot to mention that you won't be able to mention this as you won't be able to speak, well not human any way". As the man with the mask says this he pushes the metal table with Tina on it in to a chamber like room and removes all her clothing explaining that she would not need them, then he closes the door after himself and then he started typing on a keyboard. Just then a light beamed on and then the world started going black.

As Tina wakes up she is greeted by the man with the mask who explains that his experiment works, by turning a human in to a dog. Then he brought a mirror from his pockets reveling that he had turned her in to a German shepherd. "now what shall I do about you friends? I know I will....................

info.brief_description: A machine that puts a person concious into another,person, animal, object
info.description: Two male and one female friends find an old manor in the country and seek shelter there during a storm, searching the manor the find a machine in the basement Lab, that can take a person entiy and place it into another person, animal, body part, or object
